script:
1). How tall is your office building?
Fifty-three years.
Forty-six stories. 
It's near the museum.
2). What's the matter with the air conditioning?
He's not mad, just a bit upset.
Yes, my hair needs conditioning.
The control switch is broken. 
3). I expected you at two o'clock.
Sorry, I'm running late. 
I accept your apology.
I'll come back later.
